overview: It`s a hands-down sure thing...tens in anyone`s book...and bareback too! Jean-Daniel Chagall shares his bed with: Kris Evans, Julien Hussey, Kevin Warhol, and Sascha Chaykin! Guaranteed to put a tent in any aficionado`s shorts--it`s as raw and real as it gets!
title: Jean Daniel's Sex Appeal
